Name: GATARI: Sand on Teeth
About the game: Description Solo development and the first game of GameLife studio - GATARI: Sand on Teeth - casual slasher of knightly tournaments. Get new weapons in battles with bosses on an open map, performing various tasks from the inhabitants of the game world GATARI. The battles on PVE in arenas will give you extra lives and give access to new characters. Earn game points and increase your world ranking, become the best player! The game GATARI will allow you to fight in PVP tournaments, hone your skills and become the best duel player! Specifications: • Choose your character type • Character development • Receiving Various Weapons • Various bosses • Restriction on revival • Unlimited levels   Each level gives you a chance to get a new weapon or revival point. Game development plans: 1. Alfa - PVE arena battles. 2. Beta - Village Defense (Tower Defense mode)

Meta Description: Looking for information on GATARI: Sand on Teeth? Check out the release date (Apr 24, 2019), developer insights from HIDS, and a complete game summary.
